definitions.definition: A four-wheeled open carriage with seats facing each other.
A tricycle for two persons side by side.
A couch with a curved S-shaped back.
An informal party or church meeting for purposes of socializing.
(of a person) Tending to socialize or be social
definitions.example: He's normally pretty quiet, but he gets much more sociable around women.

definitions.definition: Offering opportunities for conversation; characterized by much conversation.
Capable of being, or fit to be, united in one body or company; associable.
